title: E1 - Special: DeepMind, Navier–Stokes, and the Millennium Problem
description: How AI-assisted mathematics is exploring one of the hardest open problems in fluid dynamics.

title: E2 - Weekly: AI Olympiads, Molecular Dynamics, CellTransformers, and Biosecurity Risks
description: This week in prompt science: LLMs reach gold-medal astrophysics performance, generative molecular models bridge femtosecond-to-nanosecond dynamics, transformers map the mouse brain, and biosecurity gaps emerge in AI toxin design.

title: Gemma, C2S-Scale, and the AI-Driven Path to Cancer Immunotherapy
description: A special deep dive into how Google's Gemma and the C2S-Scale model helped identify a new potential pathway for cancer immunotherapy — from AI reasoning to real biological validation in human cells.

title: GPT-5 Controversy, AI-Controlled Fusion, Campi Flegrei, Calibrating Generative Models, TorchSim, and Open Agents
description: This week’s episode covers the GPT-5/Erdős controversy and why it was a communication failure, DeepMind+CFS’s TORAX for AI-controlled fusion plasmas, an AI-revealed ring fault beneath Campi Flegrei, new methods to calibrate generative models, TorchSim’s move to community governance for MLIP simulation, and the Open Conference of AI Agents for Science 2025.
